title: Glitch when i try to move
body:
For the first ~5-10 minutes of every game, when i try to move my champion will glitch backwards. To everyone else I appear to move normally but on my screen Im constantly blinking a few units back. What can I do about this?

Edit: I turned off Movement Predict and it stopped, unsure why

replies.body:
It's a little bit different, but it sounds like you might be having some packet loss issues which are a biiiiit different than the usual lag. You can check for it really quickly using this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and having it scan the network logs from one of those weird laggy games.

Post a screenshot here or let me know what the packet loss portion said!
It isn't lag, I'm at 29 ping and 70+ fps and this has been going on for ~a week
the ping being incorrect is pretty normal. this happens all the time in a lot of games, its just lag
